OOC: Technically there's a loophole around that but it takes some creative oosting.  If you posted them as being from the future and an alternate reality then you could post it without the opposing owners permission.  This is because it would not interfere with their backstory and it isn't something that would have to be covered at some other point.  This would have to be posted explicitly however.
